revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MSI |model=RG54G |revision=S (MS-6822) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/08/2003 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=I4L-MS6818 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Silicon Data |cpu1_model=SD9216-BB |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29LV800BT-90EC |fla1_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638325TS-6 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=MSI MP54GS (MS-6818) |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3880 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3686A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=RG54GS |default_ssid_regex=^RG54GS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.msi.com/product/net/RG54GS.html Product page] :[http://faenl.msi.com/index.php?dir=CE%20Documents/68xx/RG54GS/ CE documents on the MSI website]
Per [http://de.narkive.com/2005/9/2/491446-problem-mit-internetverbindung.html this Usenet post] and the images available through the link above, :the device has a [[MSI MS-6818]] Mini PCI card installed.
The default SSID is assumed to be RG54GS. :There are approximately 500 entries for the SSID currently in WiGLE.
